scripts.deploy:local: export ENV=LOCAL && npm run build:api && npm run aws-package && npm run aws-deploy
scripts.aws-package: aws cloudformation package --template-file cloudformation.yaml --s3-bucket losonczil-packages-eu-west-1 --output-template-file packaged.cloudformation.yaml --profile losonczil
scripts.aws-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.cloudformation.yaml --stack-name foci2020-${ENV} --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --profile losonczil
